channel.title: What else needs to be developed?
channel.description:
"Server Development This section is for topics related to furthering the development of Runescape Classic servers."
Community has come along way...
With rscdv25 and the little bug fixes.
What else needs to be developed? What can be improved. If we could get a list going, it would be nice.

item.title: What else needs to be developed?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Old Rsc Player:

so rscdv25 gets leaked and everyone stops development

not everyone

Read full topic

[quote=“krisse123, post:20, topic:289795”]xEnt i really much doudt rsc has changed from what they do on rs2, mayb if you go try what i just said on rs2 u can get there

Note: how did rs2 private servers dump all the current x, y postions of objects from standing in one area then from connecting to rs?

item.title: What else needs to be developed?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“mapu, post:39, topic:289795”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=383084.msg2881946#msg2881946 date=1248394094]

Cuz if they have it, maybe they could cough it up and just improve it.
If not just make it from scratch. So im guesing it was niggerated.

If anyone else has anything post it.

ill be releasing the list after its finished.
[/quote]why do you need their code? if your being serious about fixing up all the things you mentioned in the first post, you won’t need other peoples code :\

It would make life easier…

It’s like if you’re serious about rsc development don’t use reines code?[/quote]
Theres a difference in leeching 5 minutes of code, than leeching 5 months.

Read full topic

item.title: What else needs to be developed?
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

im just making a list for everyone.
Maybe someone will pull a team together to work on it.
I dont have time to do it myself atm, but
Your right I wont need other peoples code and i know that.
However there is so much stuff on this list that if other people
already have code or something to get started, like mapu stated
it makes life easier.

item.title: What else needs to be developed?
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

I don’t know if it was mentioned, but fix the mage wall. If anyone can remember, you stand by the front of it and you can’t be attacked. And also fix poisoned daggers? I think it was. That was a big part of getting someone off the wall.

Read full topic

item.title: What else needs to be developed?
item.dc:creator: @aaronsc aaronsc
item.description:
@aaronsc wrote:

haha, glad i can bring up something of importance. Also, has anyone brought up the mage arena wall, In the original RSC you couldn’t physically attack someone sitting on the mage bank wall, you could cast on them all you wanted though

Read full topic

item.title: What else needs to be developed?

item.source: What else needs to be developed?

item.title: What else needs to be developed?
item.dc:creator: @aaronsc aaronsc
item.description:
@aaronsc wrote:

I did read about the cannons recently. Everything worth mentioning has been mentioned i believe. Mini quests, actual quests, mini dialogue between certain npcs, agility perfected… poision would be nice to seen back into pking.

I’d like to say, i still have a couple rsc accounts that can log into the actual game. So if anyone needs any help logging information, i am more than willing to help in the developement of anything related to RSC. i played from the time it came out and a little into the rs2 stages but never got into it. I’ve always been an rsc type a’ guy and always will be. So if you need any help with anything don’t hesitate to ask. I’m not a java guru but i can help with some small things, any xml edits, or the NPC’s chat, no matter how small. willing to help. Great job trying to get this all in one topic btw

Also, not sure i have seen this but, bring the desert back, where you lose hp when your out there to long, cactuses, water jugs, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: What else needs to be developed?
